pages.title: Adder
pages.text: They are not regarded as especially dangerous; the snake is not aggressive and usually bites only when really provoked, stepped on, or picked up.$(br2)Bites can be very painful, but are seldom fatal.$(br2)It feeds on small mammals, birds, lizards, and amphibians, and in some cases on spiders, worms, and insects.

pages.title: Adder
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
